name: Zenith A40 Utility VertiLift Table
descr:
A40-Zenith Utility VertiLift with auto-cocking air drops

Standard Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty
Tilt Headpiece; Adjustable Width
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser
Soft Hinged Dorsal
Swingaway Abdominal-Adjustable Tension
Slide & Crank Pelvic
Auto-Cocking Pneumatic Lo-Force® Terminal Point Pelvic Drop 
Adjustable Front Section
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion
Tuckaway Foot Board w/Auto Relaxer
Sensation Upholstery 
Sure Step Footswitch
Platinum Base Color

Table Specifications:
Length 78”
Heights 24” to 30”
Width 24”
Weight 500 lbs.

Custom Comfort Choices - 
Cushions:
Width: 18” or 21” 
Upholstery:
Style: Rilex or Traditional
Type: Sensation, Leather, Heritage
